EmailTemplate.name: DoubleClick for Salesforce - New Version Notification - Summer '17
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K DoubleClick for Salesforce - New Version Notification - Summer '17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm pleased to announce that we're wrapping up testing on the next release of the DoubleClick for Salesforce connector. This release contains several key enhancements, including:
- Stabilize the Proposal and Proposal Line Item sync services, reducing the likelihood of the jobs halting and restarting in the middle of a sync unexpectedly - Upgrades to the scheduled sync jobs so they can restart themselves if they fail unexpected - Remove deleted Proposal Line Items from Salesforce during the scheduled sync - Sync Cost Adjusted Proposal Line Items as $0 Opportunity Line Items
The full release notes are available at the link below, as well as in the 10K Community under the Knowledge tab.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Dpv8br9hYPavE18VJTiMz7cXEFiM17_VTrQz6ydkQ38/edit#
Our target timeline for the upgrade is:
- Sandboxes on or before May 28th - Production on or before June 11th
When the final testing of the release is wrapped up in the next couple of days, we'll create a Case in the 10K Community to notify you that the package is ready to go, and to coordinate a time when we can upgrade your Sandbox.
In the mean time, please review the release notes, and let me know of any feedback or questions.
Thanks, Matt
Matthew Lamb VP, Technology 10K Advisors
